PAD_Jaheira.synopsis: Jaheira has spotted the player putting on the necklace that Khalid gave her, when she either has no idea that they took it or is aware but wasn't happy about it.
PAD_Jaheira.how_to_trigger: - Take Khalid's amulet without Jaheira seeing- Equip it infront of her

PAD_Jaheira_0.speaker: Jaheira
PAD_Jaheira_0.text: Oh. By all means, what's mine is yours. Mind it doesn't choke you.
PAD_Jaheira_0.context: NodeContext: Flat, absolutely not impressed. We just equipped a precious amulet made by her dead husband, right in front of her.
